comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do no edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: round
description:
Rounds a number to the closest number with the specified number of digits.
Defaults to 0 digits if no number of digits is provided. If the specified number
of digits is negative, rounds to the number of digits left of the decimal point.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: decimals
params.description: The number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 0. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: decimals
params.description: The number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 0. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: decimals
params.description: The number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 0. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: number
params.description: The numeric value to round. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

examples:
FROM employees
| KEEP first_name, last_name, height
| EVAL height_ft = ROUND(height * 3.281, 1)
